RepaymentsOfLongTermDebt.description: The cash outflow for debt initially having maturity due after one year or beyond the normal operating cycle, if longer.

RepaymentsOfOtherShortTermDebt.label: Repayments of Other Short-term Debt
RepaymentsOfOtherShortTermDebt.description: Amount of cash outflow for the payment of debt classified as other, maturing within one year or the operating cycle, if longer.

RevenueFromContractWithCustomerExcluding.label: Revenue from Contract with Customer, Excluding Assessed Tax
RevenueFromContractWithCustomerExcluding.description: Amount, excluding tax collected from customer, of revenue from satisfaction of performance obligation by transferring promised good or service to customer. Tax collected from customer is tax assessed by governmental authority that is both imposed on and concurrent with specific revenue-producing transaction, including, but not limited to, sales, use, value added and excise.

Revenues.label: Revenues
Revenues.description: Amount of revenue recognized from goods sold, services rendered, insurance premiums, or other activities that constitute an earning process. Includes, but is not limited to, investment and interest income before deduction of interest expense when recognized as a component of revenue, and sales and trading gain (loss).

RevenuesFromTransactionsWithOtherOperati.label: Segment Reporting Information, Intersegment Revenue (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
RevenuesFromTransactionsWithOtherOperati.description: Amount of revenue from transactions with other operating segments of the same entity.

RightOfUseAssetObtainedInExchangeForOper.label: Right-of-Use Asset Obtained in Exchange for Operating Lease Liability
RightOfUseAssetObtainedInExchangeForOper.description: Amount of increase in right-of-use asset obtained in exchange for operating lease liability.

SalesRevenueNet.label: Revenue, Net (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
SalesRevenueNet.description: Total revenue from sale of goods and services rendered during the reporting period, in the normal course of business, reduced by sales returns and allowances, and sales discounts.

SegmentReportingInformationRevenue.label: Segment Reporting Information, Revenue for Reportable Segment (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
SegmentReportingInformationRevenue.description: Amount of total revenue for the reportable segments, including revenue from external customers, transactions with other operating segments of the same entity, and (gross) interest revenue. All considered to be "operating revenue" for purposes of the taxonomy.

ShippingHandlingAndTransportationCosts.label: Shipping, Handling and Transportation Costs (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
ShippingHandlingAndTransportationCosts.description: Cost incurred during the reporting period in transporting goods and services to customers. Includes freight-out costs.

ShortTermBankLoansAndNotesPayable.label: Short-term Bank Loans and Notes Payable
ShortTermBankLoansAndNotesPayable.description: Amount of borrowings from a bank classified as other, maturing within one year or operating cycle, if longer.

TradingSecuritiesCurrent.label: Trading Securities, Current (Deprecated 2014-01-31)
TradingSecuritiesCurrent.description: Amount of investments in debt and equity securities and other forms of securities that provide ownership interests classified as trading, expected to be converted to cash, sold or exchanged within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

LoansReceivableHeldForSaleAmount.label: Financing Receivable, Held-for-Sale
LoansReceivableHeldForSaleAmount.description: Amount, before valuation allowance, of financing receivable classified as held-for-sale.

NotesReceivableGross.label: Financing Receivable, before Allowance for Credit Loss
NotesReceivableGross.description: Amount, before allowance for credit loss, of financing receivable.

EarningsPerShareBasic.label: Earnings Per Share, Basic
EarningsPerShareBasic.description: The amount of net income (loss) for the period per each share of common stock or unit outstanding during the reporting period.

IncreaseDecreaseInOtherNoncurrentAssets.label: Increase (Decrease) in Other Noncurrent Assets
IncreaseDecreaseInOtherNoncurrentAssets.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in noncurrent assets classified as other.

OtherAssetsNoncurrent.label: Other Assets, Noncurrent
OtherAssetsNoncurrent.description: Amount of noncurrent assets classified as other.

AllowanceForDoubtfulAccountsReceivableRe.label: Accounts Receivable, Allowance for Credit Loss, Recovery
AllowanceForDoubtfulAccountsReceivableRe.description: Amount of increase in allowance for credit loss on accounts receivable, from recovery.

EarningsPerShareDiluted.label: Earnings Per Share, Diluted
EarningsPerShareDiluted.description: The amount of net income (loss) for the period available to each share of common stock or common unit outstanding during the reporting period and to each share or unit that would have been outstanding assuming the issuance of common shares or units for all dilutive potential common shares or units outstanding during the reporting period.
